title: Find help
saved_resource: A list with your saved resources will appear on this screen
location_guess_error: If this is not correct or you prefer to see information about resources from another place you can choose another location
about_mf_text1: Moving Forward is an initiative promoted by CEAR (Spanish Commission for Refugee Assistance, www.cear.es) with the motivation to make more accessible the social resources to which migrants and refugees are entitled.
about_mf_text2: All the content (resources of different types such as emergency, legal, health, accommodation and others) is extracted from the official CEAR guides.
